Replace.Text: The time to build Industrial Zones, Military Camps, and Holy Sites has been halved. +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for urban mines with industrial zones. When a city with a barracks completes the production of melee, ranged, and anti-cavalry units, it will get two of these units. +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each citizen of a city with a holy site. +5 [ICON_Strength] for military units in friendly territory Combat When not in war with any civilization, increase output by 15%; Cities with Industrial Zones, Barracks or Holy Sites produce +50% [ICON_Production] Production of Military Units when at war with other civilizations. [NEWLINE] Establish or occupy cities to gain additional territory. Every adjacent Tundra, Tundra Hills tile gives +1 to City Center [ICON_Food] Food, each adjacent snow tile provides +1 to the city center [ICON_Food] Food, each adjacent snow hill provides +1 to the city center [ICON_Production] productivity.
Civilizations allied with it have +7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. Volga gains 20% of its allies' Culture [ICON_Culture]. Gain an additional +2 Alliance Points each turn.
+7 Combat Strength from alliance with Volga

The northern joint characteristic area replaces the "industrial area", which costs less to build and appears earlier. The "Red October Industrial Estate" area is fortified and can perform ranged attacks. Once this area is built, the "Apprentice" technology can be unlocked. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 for every adjacent strategic resource, quarry [ICON_Production] Production.

The Northern United feature area, which replaces the Neighborhood and appeared earlier. Base +4 [ICON_Housing] housing, based on the charm of the cell, will also add additional [ICON_Housing] housing. Has two citizen slots. Can get +4 [ICON_Food] food, +4 [ICON_Production] productivity from the adjacent collective community
Northern United unique melee unit that replaces infantry. Has higher [ICON_Strength] combat strength, lower productivity requires no special resources, and can conduct long-range attacks.

Brave Volga, the supreme leader of the Northern United, you are deeply aware of your heavy responsibilities, but you are also full of confidence and determination. Under your leadership, Northern United will surely move towards a brilliant tomorrow. For Northern Union ypa!
Will you make a treaty of friendship with me?
We have no peace until your crimes are paid for!
Let the war end. There are too many cries in the earth!
I allow you to pass through our territory, but please be careful not to have any dangerous thoughts.
Sorry, after my careful consideration, I cannot let you pass.
Our army needs to pass through your territory, please allow us to pass.
I see your army approaching our border, please withdraw immediately! Avoid misunderstandings.
I am Volga, the supreme leader of the Northern Union, are you interested in coming to our great motherland?
Nice to meet you. I invite you to come to our nearby cities and see our great motherland!
Can you exchange information about the capital, which will help us to jointly develop trade routes in the north.
War will only bring misfortune, only peace and stability can the country be prosperous and strong!
Such a civilization will not last long.
What a happy day. Let us develop together! ~
Sorry I can't reply you now, I need to think carefully about this matter
Will you make a treaty of friendship with me?
I will gather all my forces to resist this war of aggression!
Strong military strength is the foundation of a country, it seems that some things can only be resolved through war
I'm sorry mother, I failed to protect you!
Your envoys are very welcome, I have received them personally!
We will not accept what we extract from people in other countries. please come back.
I have sent an envoy to give you some special products of the Northern Union, please accept these gifts.
Your arrogance and arrogance will eventually bring you down.
You are the evil of the world, dripping blood and filth from every pore from head to toe! (condemns you)
Likes civilizations with large populations, dislikes civilizations at constant war.
